00019 class XRawStreamRecordReader : public XRawStream
00020 {

00023     XRawStreamRecordReader(const char *name, bool runtime, const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &driverlist);
00024 public:
00025     virtual ~XRawStreamRecordReader() {}
00026   
00027     void terminate();
00028   
00029     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &speed() const {return m_speed;}
00030     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> &fastForward() const {return m_fastForward;}
00031     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> &rewind() const {return m_rewind;}
00032     const shared_ptr<XNode> &stop() const {return m_stop;}

00035     const shared_ptr<XNode> &back() const {return m_back;}
00036     const shared_ptr<XStringNode> &posString() const {return m_posString;}
00037 private:
00038     struct XRecordError : public XKameError {
00039         XRecordError(const XString &msg, const char *file, int line)
00040             : XKameError(msg, file, line) {}
00041     };
00042     struct XIOError : public XRecordError {
00043         XIOError(const char *file, int line);
00044         XIOError(const XString &msg, const char *file, int line);
00045     };
00046     struct XBufferOverflowError : public XIOError {
00047         XBufferOverflowError(const char *file, int line);
00048     };
00049     struct XBrokenRecordError : public XRecordError {
00050         XBrokenRecordError(const char *file, int line);
00051     };
00052     struct XNoDriverError : public XRecordError {
00053         XNoDriverError(const XString &driver_name, const char *file, int line);
00054         XString name;
00055     };
00056
